text:
Spent some time exploring the stalls at Anokha TechFair today and honestly, the level of innovation on display is impressive. Great to see students working on real-world problems with such clarity and confidence.
#AnokhaTechFair #Innovation #IIC #StudentInnovation #TechCulture #AmritaVishwaVidyapeetham

Anokha TechFair was a refreshing experience. From prototypes to practical solutions, the creativity and effort put in by the students really stood out.
#AnokhaTechFair #InnovationInAction #IIC #FutureTech #StudentProjects #Amrita

Visited Anokha TechFair and came away genuinely inspired. The ideas, teamwork, and execution across stalls show how strong hands-on learning can be.
#AnokhaTechFair #InnovationCulture #IIC #ExperientialLearning #TechExpo #AmritaVishwaVidyapeetham

What I liked most about Anokha TechFair was the diversity of ideas—hardware, software, research, and startups all coming together in one place.
#AnokhaTechFair #InnovationHub #IIC #StartupCulture #EmergingTech #Amrita
